title: Data file
description: Schema for submitting metadata for a data file.
comment: This object type is abstract. These properties are inherited by other object types

items.title: Alternate Accession
items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.

validated.title: Validated
validated.description: If true, then the metadata has been validated against the data file which it representes.
validated.comment: Do not submit. The server will assign a value of 'false' and later be updated by the validator.

no_file_available.title: No file available
no_file_available.description: A flag to indicate whether this file is available to download.

software.title: Software
software.description: The software used to generate the file.

content_error_detail.title: Content error detail
content_error_detail.description: Explanation of why the file failed the automated content checks.
content_error_detail.comment: Do not submit. This is posted by the checkfiles script. It is required when status is 'content error'

revoke_detail.title: Revoke error detail
revoke_detail.description: Explanation of why the file was revoked.
revoke_detail.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.
